rows.label: qst200518_msg001
rows.name: There we go - it's finished!

rows.label: qst200518_msg002
rows.name:
If Hana may say so, that looking
very cute!

rows.label: qst200518_msg014
rows.name:
Glad to hear it, Hana.
I hope the taste doesn't disappoint!

rows.label: qst200518_msg015
rows.name:
Hana love this name, too.
Lovemerry Cake sound very sweet!

rows.label: qst200518_msg016
rows.name:
Kind of you to say! This here is my
absolute masterpiece!

rows.label: qst200518_msg003
rows.name: Well! This ain't half bad!

rows.label: qst200518_msg004
rows.name:
And these products... I can see they're
incredibly well made. This place'll be
bustling before you know it!

rows.label: qst200518_msg005
rows.name:
You're welcome to open up shop
as soon as you like!

rows.label: qst200518_msg006
rows.name:
Hmm, the thing is, I'm a traveler at
heart. I was thinking we'd need to hire
some employees for while I'm away.

rows.label: qst200518_msg007
rows.name:
Don't you worry about that.
I can manage the staff here on my end.

rows.label: qst200518_msg020
rows.name: Oh, neat. Thank you!

rows.label: qst200518_msg008
rows.name:
But tell me... Why are you doing all
this for me?

rows.label: qst200518_msg009
rows.name:
Well, we both have dreams that we
want to realize. You helped me, so now
I'm helping you. That's all there is to it.

rows.label: qst200518_msg010
rows.name:
I'm going to keep working on my
painting skills too.

rows.label: qst200518_msg011
rows.name:
So you just keep making your
sweets and that'll make us both
happy-campers!

rows.label: qst200518_msg012
rows.name:
I'm really grateful to you for all this.
Thanks again.

rows.label: qst200518_msg013
rows.name:
I'll show you the best I can be,
whether I'm fighting or baking.

rows.label: qst200518_msg017
rows.name:
Still early days for the latter though,
wouldn't you say?

rows.label: qst200518_msg018
rows.name: Haha! True enough!

rows.label: qst200518_msg019
rows.name:
It'll be getting busy soon. Get your
friends to help out, won't you?

rows.label: qst200518_msg021
rows.name: Oh, I'm sure they won't mind!
